title: Wizarding 101: Static Electricity Magic Tricks

speakers.name: Sean Wedig
speakers.bio: Sean Wedig is a Staff Software Engineer, tech talk organizer, mustache-wielder, and general loud mouth. He's been doing various forms of professional software development for about 20 years and making terrible puns for even longer. He's currently working on neat R&D problems in computer vision and geometric model search algorithms, while also getting awesome people to talk about awesome things at Physna, the company behind Thangs.com.

excerpt: Learn the summoning charm, and make inanimate objects dance!  Bend the flow of water without touching it!  Summon a golem to do your bidding! description:
Learn the summoning charm, and make inanimate objects dance!  Bend the flow of water without touching it!  Summon a golem to do your bidding!  Learn the infamous "Wingardium Leviosa", and make things levitate!  Grab your wizarding robes, cheer for your house, control the very forces of nature with electromancy!  ... But it's not magic - it's science!

Participants will take home a "magic" wand and materials for a few "spells" at home.
